Recommendations

St. Nicholas, Angel and the Devil walk on the 5th of December every year. This tradition is very popular amongst parents and their children, at least amongst the naughty ones.

However, in terms of the possible spread of the virus, this is a risky activity, and it is good to be cautious about it. There are no measures that would potentially affect St. Nicholas, respectively St. Nicholas events at the moment. 

However, the general measure on the restriction of the free movement of persons implies that only family members will be able to do the devil, St. Nicholas or the angel.

The government measure can change until 5.12. 2020 according to PES 3 matrice. When PES 3 is implicated, there is no ban on the free movement of persons.

In case of a visit of the Devil, St. Nicholas and Angel at your home, it is recommended, if possible, that the meeting takes place outside.

If it will be possible to hold social events with a St. Nicholas theme, please observe the general Wear Z (face masks - social distance - disinfect your hands) when participating in the events. This will prevent the virus from spreading and help protect yourself and your surroundings.
